channel.title: Issue on Blogger Bust
channel.description: Recent content in Issue on Blogger Bust

item.title: postmarketOS pmaports Mount Issue
item.description: Table of Contents What is the issue? How to tell if your system is impacted What is the impact? What to do about it? After thoughts What is the issue? There is a known issue that root and boot partitions are being mounted by fstab when they should be mounted from the initramfs. How to tell if your system is impacted At the moment the fix is not merged, so we are all impacted.
